title.value: ValueSet - At-Home In-Vitro Test Types - COVID-19

description.value: This set of values contains COVID-19 LOINC concepts that are appropriate for at-home tests

purpose.value: The intent of this value set is to provide a subset of LOINC lab covid 19 for the types of tests used in the home

copyright.value: This material contains content from LOINC (http://loinc.org). display.value: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ag [Presence] in Upper respiratory specimen by Immunoassay
SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ag [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by Rapid immunoassay
SARS-CoV+SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ag [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by Rapid immunoassay
SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) N gene [Presence] in Nose by NAA with probe detection
